ai:cl.c: Applies a matrix convolution filter effect.

ai:a.c: Draws object graphics to drawable areas.
ai:a.p: ERR acDraw(*Object, DOUBLE X, DOUBLE Y, DOUBLE Width, DOUBLE Height)

ai:i.c: The X position of the region to be drawn.
The Y position of the region to be drawn.
The width of the region to be drawn.
The height of the region to be drawn.

ai:f.c: Used to adjust the final result of each computed RGB value.
Defines the divisor value in the convolution algorithm.
Defines the behaviour of the convolve algorithm around the edges of the input image.
A list of numbers that make up the kernel matrix for the convolution.
The number of columns in the Matrix.
The number of rows in the Matrix.
If TRUE, the alpha channel is protected from the effects of the convolve algorithm.
The X position of the matrix in relation to the input image.
The Y position of the matrix in relation to the input image.
The distance in filter units between rows in the Matrix.
The distance in filter units between columns in the Matrix.
Returns an SVG compliant XML string that describes the effect.
